summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Job Listing UI. All core features are working correctly including search, filtering, sorting, job detail modals, and responsive layout across desktop/tablet/mobile viewports. Application is fully functional with no critical issues found.
passed_tests: Job cards display correctly with title, company, location, type, salary
Search functionality filters jobs by title
Keyword highlighting in search results
Location filter dropdown works correctly
Job type filter (Internship/Full-time) works correctly
Sort A-Z button sorts jobs alphabetically
Clear filters button works
Job detail modal opens on card click
Modal displays job details with requirements
Modal close button works
Apply Now button present in modal
No results state displays when no matches
Reset all filters button in no results state works
Responsive layout works on mobile viewport (390x844)
Responsive layout works on tablet viewport (768x1024) with 2-column grid
Desktop layout works correctly with 3-column grid
Comprehensive workflow test with multiple filters and interactions
Clear search functionality works
Filter combinations work correctly
Modal functionality works across all viewports
